::Striker::

Striker frowns, walking over to the hole. He glances at Spears' hand, 
deciding it was best not to touch it, even though he had a bit of trouble 
sticking to his decition. If these bots had technology to mind-controll, 
there was no telling what else they could do.

"Allright then," he says, walking up to the door, his shoulder blasters 
emerging, "Stand back."
